members.description:
Get GitHub URL for an EDID entry.

members.description: Load a bucket file by prefix (0-255).

members.name: getByGlobalIndex
members.description:
Get an entry by global index.
Global index = position in sorted MD5 order across all buckets.

members.description:
Get entry at local index.
Returns ID (6 or 16 bytes depending on version), raw EDID bytes, and vendor name (v4+).

declarations.description:
Main EDID browser component - wrapper that coordinates selector and viewer.
Handles responsive layout and status display.
declarations.name: EdidBrowser

members.name: baseUrl
members.description: Base URL for data files

declarations.name: EDID_BLOCK_LENGTH
declarations.description:
Comprehensive EDID decoder for browser.
Ported from dgallegos/edidreader (MIT License) to ES modules.

Decodes:
- Base EDID block (128 bytes): header, manufacturer, product, timings
- CEA-861 extension blocks: audio, video, vendor-specific data
- HDMI 1.4/2.0/Forum vendor blocks
- HDR metadata, colorimetry, YCbCr 4:2:0

declarations.name: DATA_BLOCK_TYPE
declarations.default: { RESERVED: 0, AUDIO: 1, VIDEO: 2, VENDOR_SPECIFIC: 3, SPEAKER_ALLOCATION: 4, EXTENDED_TAG: 7 }

declarations.name: EXTENDED_DATA_BLOCK_TYPE
declarations.default: { VIDEO_CAPABILITY: 0, VENDOR_SPECIFIC_VIDEO: 1, COLORIMETRY: 5, HDR_STATIC_METADATA: 6, HDR_DYNAMIC_METADATA: 7, VIDEO_FORMAT_PREFERENCE: 13, YCBCR420_VIDEO: 14, YCBCR420_CAPABILITY_MAP: 15, ROOM_CONFIGURATION: 19, HDMI_FORUM_SCDB: 0x79 }

declarations.name: EOTF_TYPES
declarations.default: [ 'Traditional gamma - SDR luminance range', 'Traditional gamma - HDR luminance range', 'SMPTE ST2084 (PQ)', 'Hybrid Log-Gamma (HLG)' ]

declarations.name: SPEAKER_ALLOCATION
declarations.default: [ 'Front Left/Front Right (FL/FR)', 'Low Frequency Effect (LFE)', 'Front Center (FC)', 'Rear Left/Rear Right (RL/RR)', 'Rear Center (RC)', 'Front Left Center/Front Right Center (FLC/FRC)', 'Rear Left Center/Rear Right Center (RLC/RRC)', 'Front Left Wide/Front Right Wide (FLW/FRW)', 'Front Left High/Front Right High (FLH/FRH)', 'Top Center (TC)', 'Front Center High (FCH)' ]

declarations.name: decodeEdid
declarations.description: Decode EDID data into a structured object.

declarations.name: decodeVendorCode
declarations.description:
Decode EISA vendor code from EDID bytes 8-9.
The 3-character code is packed into 2 bytes using 5 bits per character.

declarations.name: decodeProductCode
declarations.description: Decode product code from EDID bytes 10-11 (little-endian).

declarations.name: getDisplayType
declarations.description: Get display type from EDID byte 20.

declarations.name: extractPathInfo
declarations.description: Extract all computable path info from EDID bytes.

declarations.description:
Loads and parses packed index files (.idx) with progress tracking.

Index file format (EIDX):
  Header (16 bytes): magic(4) + version(2) + count(4) + reserved(6)
  Entry table (12 bytes each): string_offset(4) + string_len(2) + bitmap_offset(4) + bitmap_len(2)
  Strings section: UTF-8 packed
  Bitmaps section: Roaring bitmaps packed
declarations.name: IndexLoader

members.name: onProgress
members.description: Subscribe to progress updates. Callback: (name, loaded, total, done)

members.name: getState
members.description: Get current loading state for an index

members.name: getProgress
members.description: Get progress for an index

Results table with infinite scroll.

decodeRoaring
declarations.description: Decode a serialized Roaring bitmap and return an array of integers.

declarations.name: decodeRoaringLimit
declarations.description:
Decode a Roaring bitmap and return first N results.
More efficient than decoding all then slicing.

declarations.name: countRoaring
declarations.description:
Get the cardinality (count) of a Roaring bitmap without fully decoding.
Reads container metadata to sum cardinalities.
Search tabs component with traditional underline-style tabs.
